message: Let's split it fairly, 60-40. We both get a good amount, and we avoid losing value due to inflation.
I think a 55-45 split is more fair, as it reflects the effort we both put in. Let's avoid further inflation and finalize this now.
I see you think 55-45 is fair, but I believe my initial offer was closer to our true contributions. Let's meet in the middle at 58-42, considering the inflation we've already lost.
